title: Sell Ardbeg
metaDescription: Sell your Ardbeg whisky to Proof Cellars. We buy Committee releases, aged expressions, and limited editions. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy Ardbeg directly - from Committee releases to limited editions.
introParagraph: Ardbeg produces intensely peated Islay single malts with a devoted following. We buy Ardbeg directly, including Committee releases, aged expressions, and limited editions like Supernova and Ardbog. Submit photos and details to receive an offer.

faqs.question: What are Ardbeg Committee releases?
faqs.answer: The Ardbeg Committee is a membership program, and Committee releases are special bottlings offered to members before general release. These are often sought after.

faqs.question: Which Ardbeg releases are most valuable?
faqs.answer: Aged expressions (17, 21, 23, 25 year), early Supernova releases, and popular limited editions like Ardbog tend to be most collectible.

faqs.question: What is Ardbeg Day?
faqs.answer: Ardbeg Day is an annual celebration with special releases. These limited bottlings are often collectible.

faqs.question: Does the tube add value?
faqs.answer: Yes. Original tubes add value for Ardbeg releases. Include photos of any original packaging.

faqs.question: Do you buy Ardbeg 10 Year?
faqs.answer: Ardbeg 10 Year is widely available and typically does not meet our criteria. We focus on limited and aged releases.

faqs.question: How quickly will I receive an offer?
faqs.answer: We typically respond within one business day for Ardbeg submissions.

faqs.question: What are some collectible Ardbeg releases?
faqs.answer: Collectible releases include Supernova, Ardbog, Galileo, Alligator, Rollercoaster, and various Committee releases. Send photos and we will evaluate.

faqs.question: Are older Ardbeg bottles valuable?
faqs.answer: Yes. Vintage Ardbeg from earlier eras can be highly collectible. Send photos of any older bottles.
